data.lyric:
[ti:July]
[ar:Noah Cyrus/Leon Bridges]
[al:July]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]July - Noah Cyrus/Leon Bridges
[00:05.18]Lyrics by：Noah Cyrus/Michael Sonier/Peter Harding/Jenna Andrews
[00:10.37]Composed by：Noah Cyrus/Michael Sonier/Peter Harding/Jenna Andrews
[00:15.55]I've been holding my breath
[00:17.16]I've been counting to 10
[00:18.84]Over something you said
[00:22.07]I've been holding back tears
[00:23.74]While you're throwing back beers
[00:25.38]I'm alone in my bed
[00:27.84]You know I I'm afraid of change
[00:34.21]Guess that's why we stay the same
[00:40.24]So tell me to leave
[00:41.86]I'll pack my bags get on the road
[00:46.86]Find someone that loves you
[00:48.88]Better than I do darling I know
[00:53.80]'Cause you remind me every day
[00:57.08]I'm not enough but I still stay
[01:03.50]Feels like a lifetime
[01:05.06]Just tryna get by
[01:06.69]While we're dying inside
[01:09.92]I've done a lot of things wrong
[01:11.71]Loving you being one
[01:13.31]But I can't move on
[01:15.77]You know I I'm afraid of change
[01:22.18]Guess that's why we stay the same
[01:28.25]So tell me to leave
[01:29.96]I'll pack my bags get on the road
[01:34.84]Find someone who gives you
[01:36.96]All of the things I could not know
[01:41.81]'Cause I keep finding all the way
[01:45.01]I let you down so I can't stay
[01:49.95]If you want me to leave
[01:51.55]Then tell me to leave and baby I'll go
[01:54.86]And baby I'll go
[02:23.36]You remind me every day
[02:26.40]I'm not enough but I still stay
data.trans:
[ti:July]
[ar:Noah Cyrus/Leon Bridges]
[al:July]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.18]//
[00:10.36]//
[00:15.55]我竭力屏住呼吸
[00:17.16]耐着性子数到十
[00:18.84]脑中回想着你所说的话语
[00:22.07]我强忍着泪水不让其夺眶而出
[00:23.74]而你只是拼命的灌醉自己
[00:25.38]我则是躺在床上孤独入眠
[00:27.84]你懂我的 我只是害怕改变
[00:34.21]也许这就是你我仍徘徊不前的原因吧
[00:40.24]就叫我决然离开吧
[00:41.86]我会果断收拾行囊 决绝启程
[00:46.86]去找个爱你的人吧
[00:48.88]比我更称职的爱人 我明白
[00:53.80]因为你无时不刻都提醒着我
[00:57.08]我不够爱你 但我仍不思改变
[01:03.50]感觉要耗尽一生的光阴
[01:05.06]只为敷衍应付
[01:06.69]而我们早已心如死灰 掀不起一丝涟漪
[01:09.92]我曾犯下许多过错
[01:11.71]爱你也列属其中
[01:13.31]而我就是不愿洒脱放手
[01:15.77]你懂我的 我只是害怕改变
[01:22.18]也许这就是你我仍徘徊不前的原因吧
[01:28.25]就叫我决然离开吧
[01:29.96]我会果断收拾行囊 决绝启程
[01:34.84]找个能给你
[01:36.96]我所不知的美好的那个人
[01:41.81]因为一直以来我也在寻觅
[01:45.01]我让你大失所望了 所以我选择离开
[01:49.95]如果你希望我离开
[01:51.55]那就直说吧 宝贝 我会毫不犹豫的离开
[01:54.86]宝贝 我会毫不犹豫的离开
[02:23.36]因为你无时不刻都提醒着我
[02:26.40]我不够爱你 但我仍不思改变
